transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

over to the right hand side you'll see
the video there and you can play it
let's get right into the economic
collapse financial news now yesterday we

the exact number and we are seeing that
corporations right now because you have
to remember they don't have the sales
they don't have the revenue they're
buying back the stock to push their

corporations they don't have the sales
in revenue so they're going to be

at all and we know at this point they're

here well we're seeing the slow

into 2008 and until we had the big bang
of the stock market coming down no
one really wanted to admit it but
remember when the market came down all
of a sudden companies came out of the

a lot more people they used this as in
as an excuse at this point and I believe
as we go throughout this year we're

no revenue coming in like it once was
we're going to see a lot more of these

chose certain cities because we know

it's still good people are still coming
but we see in the luxury market in New

happens it creeps inward
and I'm seeing this outside of all these

I see houses now coming down in prices
now when I say coming out in prices I'm
not talking about two thousand a

now a lot of people are writing in

came up with something else that
Millennials they really don't want to
